card.name: Talitha Unwin
card.rules: When Talitha Unwin enters, create a Treasure token. Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, create a Food token.
card.flavor: Before Eddie’s amazed eyes, Roland knelt before her in the dust of the town square. “Will you bless me, Old Mother?”

card.name: Trick shot
card.rules: Trick shot deals 2 damage to any target. Deft — Reload 1 (You have deft if you control a Gunslinger. Choose one — Draw a card and lose 1 life; or put a charge counter on target permanent)

card.name: Deputize
card.rules: Up to two target creatures you control become a Gunslinger in addition to their other types. Investigate once for each creature that became a Gunslinger this way.
card.flavor: “Awful good of you there, Jonas. Shiny. Bet it’ll impress the ladies.” —Clay Reynolds

card.name: Wander
card.rules: Trek (Mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand.) Until end of turn, whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
card.flavor: “Definition of a wanderer: a guy who’s always looking beyond.” —Eddie Dean

card.name: Andy the Messenger Robot
card.rules: Load X (This enters with X charge counters on it.) Andy gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on it. T, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one — Put a charge counter on target artifact; or put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
card.flavor: Design: MESSENGER (Many other Functions) Serial # DNF-34821-V-63
